article_title: Everything you need to know about 'the woman tax'
article_text:
Thank you for your interest in licensing Fortune content. Please find information on various licensing contacts below and choose the one that best suits your needs:

1. To license Fortune articles, excerpts, or headlines for republication in various media (including books, eBooks, film, web, newsletters, newspapers, magazines and others), please email syndication@timeinc.com.

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

3. To license text only photocopies of Fortunearticles as print or digital handouts in academic settings, or in academic coursepacks, please contact the Copyright Clearance Center at www.copyright.com

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Marin Gazzaniga

twitter.description: The gender pay gap made headlines this month, with the U.S. Census Bureau reporting that women working full-time now make 79 cents for every dollar men make, up from 78 cents in 2013. While some ce...
twitter.title: Everything you need to know about the ‘woman tax’

article_metadata.keywords: wage gap, woman tax, what women pay more for, gender pay gap, cost of child care, cost of maternity leave, women charged more
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: gender wage gap, wage gap, woman tax
article_metadata.description: It's not just the wage gap that hurts women's wallets. Women also may more than men do for many of the same products and services.
